div.div: District Health Related Closure Preparedness Plan: COVID-19

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled District Health Related Closure Preparedness Plan: COVID-19

strong.br: Welcome to the Hawthorne Public Schools information/resource page on Health Related Preparedness. We remain vigilant in our efforts to keep our parents informed and will continue to update our parents and community members with any changes to our school schedule.

span.a: Commissioner of Education's Memo re: Reopening of Schools

br.a: Updated 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 Guidance for Child Care and K-12 Schools.pdf
Guidance Regarding Requirements for Public Health-Related School Closure
Updates and FAQ's Related to COVID-19 School Closures
March 23rd Updates and FAQ's related to COVID-19 School Closures

strong.span: School Health Related Closure Preparedness Plan

p.br:
Attached below is the Hawthorne Public School's approved school health-related closure preparedness plan as required by the NJ Department of Education. This plan is a working document and will be revised as needed.
Public Health-Related School Closure Plan
________________________________________________________________________________________________
Home / Online instruction and Attendance daily instructions.
1. Click on Remote Learning Attendance below
2. Click on the appropriate link and access the 10 day Instructional Plan
Important Correspondence
IMPORTANT School Closure Information Hawthorne Public Schools FAQ's Parent Letter Regarding Food Services UPDATED Letter Regarding Food Services NEW: UPDATED Special Education Information for Parents NEW: AP Testing Update for Students at HHS
Guidance Department Memos Talking to Children about COVID-19: A Parent Resource An Important Message from the Hawthorne Guidance Department March 30th Guidance Update and Community Resources NEW: Online Series for Families NEW: Video on Social / Emotional Tools for Families
Plans for Online / Home Instruction Please click on the appropriate grade level to access the Home Instruction resources. Weeks 3 and 4: HHS LMS Jefferson Roosevelt Washington Weeks 3 and 4 (March 30 - April 3 and April 13 - April 17) Weeks 5 and 6: HHS LMS Jefferson Roosevelt Washington Weeks 5 and 6 (April 20 - May 1)
NEW: Additional Activities for Independent Learning
NEW: Spring Break Activities
NEW: A Parents Guide to Google Classroom
Daily Attendance
Please make sure to record attendance DAILY using the link below and your child's Student ID number.
To enter attendance: Click on the link below, enter Student ID Number and click Scan
Remote Learning Attendance
